website_summaries.verdict: From the ride it provides to the way it looks, this model earns our top spot for being the best on nearly all fronts from Diamondback Bicycles.
pros: Earns praise for offering a nice, comfortable ride in a variety of settings, from cruising around town to riding light trails
Has a lightweight design, good looks, 24 speeds, and smooth-shifting gears
cons: The disc brakes occasionally need to be tweaked, as they tend to squeak and rub

website_summaries.verdict: Diamondback is renowned for making quality bikes, and this one is no different, as it can handle just about any terrain and traveling conditions with agility and speed.
pros: In addition to offering a 24-speed drive train that shifts easily, this comfortable bike earns praise for being fairly easy to assemble and comfortable to ride
Flat handles are easy to grip
cons: The disc brakes are the most difficult part of the assembly process and may require a professional's expertise

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Ladies Bike
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bike and rides well. My only complaint is the brakes. Not very good. Really got to press hard to stop. Disappointing to be disc brakes. I have another bike with non-disc v-brakes and that bike stops when you lightly press the brakes.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Davis

customer_reviews.title: Happy Rider
customer_reviews.text: Awesome experience! I got my back within a couple of days. It was as advertised; no dings, no dings, or missing parts. It a good buy and best price. I'm a beginner rider who wanted to change up my cardio scene. This brand was recommended. Other places had this bike for way more. So happy I found a good bike at a great price. I'll have to post another review once I get some mikes in.
customer_reviews.author: Phyla

customer_reviews.title: Now with disk brakes I see a nice easy maintenance free future ahead
customer_reviews.text: I can't see paying any less for what I consider to be a "real" bike as opposed to the kind of junk you can pick up at Walmart and Target. Well made and well put together. I bought this as a replacement to the junior version byt Diamondback that my daughter has had for 4 years and it worked flawlessly. Now with disk brakes I see a nice easy maintenance free future ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Keifer H

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Great Looks
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bike! It's sharp-looking and runs smoothly. Very comfortable ride. Lightweight and easy to mount on bike rack and bike hooks in the garage. My only suggestion to the manufacturer would be to add a kick-stand and water bottle holder. On the other hand, I had fun purchasing color-coordinated accessories! Bike arrived well-packaged and at least 75% assembled. Assembly instructions included, but I found it easier to go onto the Diamondback website and follow along with their short, easy to understand videos. Love Diamondback brand, and would definitely recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good bike for the price. Reasonable weight. In my fife case I replaced stem to provide a more upright riding position. Assembly not difficult. You need to have some familiarity with bike mechanics. Rapid fire shifters work well. Will need some adjustments. Especially disk brakes. Allen keys attaching seat to seat post are way over tightened from factory. Have not been able to loosen yet. Pretty good components except Tourney front derailleur.
customer_reviews.author: Cary

customer_reviews.title: When I say I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the mens version of the same bike about a year earlier... When I say I love it.... ( I mean , the gal I bought it for TOTALLY LOVES IT).. Enough Said.. === Everything works.. Its Light, and performs HELL better than her bike from "GIANT" uff-dah.. !
customer_reviews.author: TonyD

customer_reviews.title: Amazing ride and fun !!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike. it is smooth riding as well as sturdy yet light. I had a cruiser style in the past and wanted something better and this is more than better. It is a nice ride and gears shift so smoothly which makes for much easier riding. the appearance is nice as well as it looks even nicer in person. this handles on and off road well and is easy to put on the bike rack as well
customer_reviews.author: Arriana

customer_reviews.title: Solid bike. Light weight enough for what it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid bike. Light weight enough for what it is. I ride any where from 5 miles - 20miles per ride. gears shift smoothly
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: I love this bike
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike! its light, feels good to ride, works well on the street and non-paved paths. The only time I had a hard time riding it was on a rocky hiking path uphill. However, thats not whats its made for.
customer_reviews.author: Deyni

customer_reviews.title: They were great, and the shipping was super quick
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the wrong size, so sent my bike back, for a full refund, and got the correct size. They were great, and the shipping was super quick!!! The bike came mostly assembled, only took a few minutes to finish putting together, and rides like a dream!!! I did go to REI to get a tune-up prior to my first street ride, but, I couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Felicity

customer_reviews.title: Good bike for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bike for the price. It comes assembled minus the tires/ handle bars and brakes. Smooth ride and very stylish frame. Brakes could be better but other than that it’s a buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great bike, great price! Got it tuned up at local bike shop and it runs perfectly! Thank you for such a good value in a "used" bike that was practically new!
customer_reviews.author: Karin Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great ride.
customer_reviews.text: Bike went together easily and is well made. Wife loves the ride and acceleration easier. Her old Diamondback was 20 years old seat and gearing different and brakes are fabulous, but take a bit to break in. You'll love the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: Really wonderfully quality, I ride it 3 days a week for 10 miles through forrest/pathed areas. Great ride, gears change smoothly. Highly recommend for price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great bike for the price and deal over Dick's sporting goods.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Ruegg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value for a superior quality bike! Wife loves it!
customer_reviews.author: MichaelO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike, it's perfect for where I ride.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie Little

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is a very nice ride for the price. Totally worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bike for my daughter. She is very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and secure
customer_reviews.text: My wife ate very happy with this Bike is very fast and Light.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the price, and very easy to assemble. I had to adjust the front disk brake, but that was it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany L Black

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bike very well made and very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Ybarra

customer_reviews.title: but it is a beautiful bike! I can't wait to take it for ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't ridden this yet, but it is a beautiful bike! I can't wait to take it for a spin! It looks to be made VERY well and it's just so pretty. I love the shifters and the handle grips! The purple however, is more of a pink/magenta color, so if you're looking for purple, this is not the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Genna L. Rumble

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: So happy my husband bought this for me as an early Xmas gift. Such a smooth ride, and very well built.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Galarza-Vega

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic bike, LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic bike, LOVE it. I did take it to a bike shop to get tuned and put together properly. Anticipate that to take a day or two, then it was another $100+ to have that done, but again, love the bike and it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Adonis Newkirk

customer_reviews.title: I'm so in love with this bike
customer_reviews.text: I'm so in love with this bike! My only complaint is no kickstand...why ever would they sell a bike with no kickstand? Minor complaint though, I would still by again, regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia M

customer_reviews.title: great bike
customer_reviews.text: Great Bike, very easy to set up, runs great, I bought this for my wife and and she ride it like 50 miles on the first week, she really loved it, the colors are great and is very heavy
customer_reviews.author: Salvador Villegas

customer_reviews.title: Love this bike but a total headache to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bike! Exactly what I was looking for. Lost two stars because the tools to assemble the bike were not included so I had to go out and buy some specialty tools. And the bike is definitely not "ready to ride". The front wheel, pedals, handlebars, seat, and breaks lines are all not connected upon arrival. It may be easier for a more experienced bicyclist, but for me it took about 3 hours (and a lot of frustration and YouTube videos) to assemble. Definitely worth getting this bike, but maybe get it assembled by a professional bike shop.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MY BIKE
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this bike for me on my 65th birthday--yes, folks--I am a very active lady. I LOVE MY BIKE!!!! I am riding 15 miles a day, and feel great. The bike is a comfortable fit (I am 5'6" and I have the Medium sized bike). I added a bottle holder and kickstand (and a bell, of course), and I have only one minor issue--I ordered a new padded seat--after 15 miles a day...you get the picture. The gears are very easy to switch. Absolutely LOVE this bike and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jannie

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike looking forward to riding when the weather breaks but stoves with chipped paint
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and is comfortable to sit on. After removing the protection I noticed a couple of paint chips. See photo, this was under the protection that showed no sign of damage so I’m assuming the bike was packaged damaged, which is a bit disappointing. I did take a short spin in the driveway to make sure everything else worked. It did but I have to agree with the comment about the disk breaks not stopping the bike as well as one would think.
customer_reviews.author: RJM

product_meta.title: Diamondback Bicycles Women's 2016 Clarity 2 Complete Performance Hybrid Bike
product_meta.description: Our women's performance hybrid bikes blend the best of road and mountain worlds to result in a sleek bike with an upright riding position. The clarity 2 ticks these boxes and more: it's an efficient bike that you can pedal comfortably all day, on rides of any length. The aluminum frame is durable, light, and responsive. A low stand over height ensures easy on/off, and women's-specific touchpoints make this bike comfortable right out of the box. With 24 gears to choose from you'll be prepared for any climb, and when it's time to descend the disc brakes provide great stopping power--even in a pouring rain. The clarity 2 accepts racks and fenders easily, meaning this weekend joyrider can become a daily commuter in no time.
feature_bullets: Hand built Devine designs 6061-T6 aluminum alloy frame is durable and comfortably compliant
Integrated Aero alloy straight blade fork delivers Quick, confident handling
Shimano 24-speed drivetrain provides gears for any terrain
Tektro mechanical disc brakes will give ambundant stopping power
